page.title: 03Education
page.content:
EDUCATION
The School Much Birch School has four classes, each with a teacher.Altogether there are 108 children in the school as well as the classes, it has a kitchen with one cook and one dinner lady,and a hall,a staff room with a partime secretary,three cloakrooms and a resource room which has a library, T.V. viewing area, and computer area.The school also has three computers.Outside there is a playing field and two tarmac playgrounds,a games shed and a sandpit.At the bottom of the school_grounds there is some old tarmac where an old classroom was used to be, this is next to the old school and house which is now private accommodation.The school is adjacent to the A49 trunk road .
